contentrichtext.text: {{infobox royalty | name = King Hui of Zhou<br/>周惠王 | succession = King of China | reign = 676–652 BC | predecessor = [[King Xi of Zhou]] | successor = [[King Xiang of Zhou]] | issue = [[King Xiang of Zhou]] | full name = [[Chinese ancestral name|Ancestral name]]: [[Ji (surname)|Jī]] (姬)<br/>Given name: '''Làng''' (閬) | house = [[Zhou Dynasty]] | father = [[King Xi of Zhou]]<ref>''The Cambridge history of ancient China: from the origins of civilization to 221 B.C.'' Written by Michael Loewe.</ref> |spouse =Huì<ref>[https://sites.google.com/site/historicdynasties/china/zhou4 Family tree of Chinese kings]</ref> | death_date = 652 BC }} {{Chinese text}} {{Portal|China}} '''King Hui of Zhou''' ({{zh|c=周惠王|p=Zhōu Huì Wáng}}) was the seventeenth king of the Chinese [[Zhou Dynasty]] and the fifth of Eastern Zhou.<ref>''[[Records of the Grand Historian]]'' by [[Sima Qian]]</ref> == References == <references/> == See also == *[[Family tree of ancient Chinese emperors]] {{Start}} {{S-hou|[[Zhou Dynasty]]||||652 BC}} {{S-reg}} {{S-bef|before=[[King Xi of Zhou]]}} {{S-ttl|title=[[List of Chinese monarchs|King of China]]|years=676–652 BC}} {{S-aft|after=[[King Xiang of Zhou]]}} {{End}} {{Kings of Zhou}} {{Persondata <!-- Metadata: see [[Wikipedia:Persondata]]. --> | NAME = King Hui of Zhou | ALTERNATIVE NAMES = | SHORT DESCRIPTION = King of Zhou Dynasty China | DATE OF BIRTH = | PLACE OF BIRTH = | DATE OF DEATH = 652 BC | PLACE OF DEATH = }} {{DEFAULTSORT:Hui of Zhou, King}} [[Category:652 BC deaths]] [[Category:Zhou Dynasty kings]] [[Category:7th-century BC rulers]] [[Category:Year of birth unknown]]
